name: Poly Fit 3D
description:
The puzzle is easy, there are several pieces which are the parts of a mystery object. To reveal it, you need to fit the pieces one by one. No rotations are allowed, just drag the pieces and drop them at right place.

Features:
* Suitable for all ages, specially good for geometrical thinking.
* No time limits, enjoy the relaxing puzzles.
* Free to play, play it anytime anywhere
